text.text: Welcome to my {b}FIRST BULLETIN{/b}! . . . sort of, Uhh I have multiple projects in the works. I'll have updates on these online bulletins, which are found in any of my projects. Also I'm kicking off my Patreon (see the patreon tab on the bulletin for a link and info), where updates for my projects (art posts and gifs/videos) and Renpy tricks & assets will be posted for patrons.
